languages.text: "Знаете, как у нас говорят, господин дознаватель. Если промахнулись в первый раз, всегда есть другие патроны в магазине".
languages.translation_comment: Romance with Heinrix broken in the Jealousy dialogue.

traits.locale_text: "Знаете, как у нас говорят, господин дознаватель. Если промахнулись в первый раз, всегда есть другие патроны в магазине".

languages.text: "You know, we have a saying, Master Interrogator: if you miss your first shot, there are always other rounds in the magazine."
languages.translation_comment: Romance with Heinrix broken in the Jealousy dialogue.
languages.original_text: "Знаете, как у нас говорят, господин дознаватель. Если промахнулись в первый раз, всегда есть другие патроны в магазине".

traits.locale_text: "You know, we have a saying, Master Interrogator: if you've missed your first shot, there are always other rounds in the magazine."
"You know, we have a saying, Master Interrogator: if you've missed your first shot, there are always other rounds in the magazine."
"You know, we have a saying, Master Interrogator: if you miss your first shot, there are always other rounds in the magazine."
"You know, we have a saying, Master Interrogator: if you miss your first shot, there are always other rounds in the magazine."
"You know, we have a saying, Master Interrogator: if you miss your first shot, there are always other rounds in the magazine."
"You know, we have a saying, Master Interrogator: if you miss your first shot, there are always other rounds in the magazine."

languages.text: 「いいか、インテロゲイター殿。我々にはこういう言葉がある。『一発目を外しても、弾倉にはまだ弾は残っている』」
languages.original_text: "You know, we have a saying, Master Interrogator: if you miss your first shot, there are always other rounds in the magazine."

traits.locale_text: 「いいか、インテロゲイター殿。我々にはこういう言葉がある。『一発目を外しても、弾倉にはまだ弾は残っている』」

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr, bei uns gibt es eine Redewendung, Meister Interrogator: Wenn der erste Schuss daneben geht, hat man noch weitere Kugeln im Magazin."
languages.original_text: "You know, we have a saying, Master Interrogator: if you miss your first shot, there are always other rounds in the magazine."

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr, bei uns gibt es eine Redewendung, Meister Interrogator: Wenn der erste Schuss daneben geht, hat man noch weitere Kugeln im Magazin."

languages.text: « Vous savez, maître interrogateur, nous avons un dicton : si vous ratez votre premier coup, il y a toujours d'autres balles dans le chargeur. »
languages.original_text: "You know, we have a saying, Master Interrogator: if you miss your first shot, there are always other rounds in the magazine."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez, maître interrogateur, nous avons un dicton : si vous ratez votre premier coup, il y a toujours d'autres balles dans le chargeur. »

languages.text: «Los Arbitrator tenemos un dicho, maese interrogador: aunque falles el primer disparo, siempre te quedan más proyectiles en el cargador».
languages.original_text: "You know, we have a saying, Master Interrogator: if you miss your first shot, there are always other rounds in the magazine."

traits.locale_text: «Los Arbitrator tenemos un dicho, maese interrogador: aunque falles el primer disparo, siempre te quedan más proyectiles en el cargador».

languages.text: “我们法务部有这么一句话，审讯官大师——就算第一枪打偏了，也还有剩下的子弹呢。”
languages.original_text: "You know, we have a saying, Master Interrogator: if you miss your first shot, there are always other rounds in the magazine."

traits.locale_text: “我们法务部有这么一句话，审讯官大师——就算第一枪打偏了，也还有剩下的子弹呢。”

languages.text: "Bizim oralarda bir laf vardır Üstat Sorgucu: 'İlk atışı ıskalasan da şarjör hâlâ dolu."
languages.original_text: "You know, we have a saying, Master Interrogator: if you miss your first shot, there are always other rounds in the magazine."

traits.locale_text: "Bizim oralarda bir laf vardır Üstat Sorgucu: 'İlk atışı ıskalasan da şarjör hâlâ dolu."

languages.original_text: "You know, we have a saying, Master Interrogator: if you miss your first shot, there are always other rounds in the magazine."
